fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- An Umbrae Assault role will always spawn. 
- 656: Deity will spawn as long as the Umbrae has at least two members. 
- Factional chat
- No factional kill
- Umbrae have detection immunity on moonless nights.
- If an Umbra Assault member or the Deity dies, the Prophet will be promoted to that role if possible. Otherwise, another random Umbra will be promoted. 
- The Umbrae have enhanced abilities on Blood Moons. If the Umbrae are in the game, a Blood Moon always happens on Night 4, and then the Umbrae can choose to call a Blood Moon on any other night from Night 5 onwards. The Town will be notified if there's a Blood Moon.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Umbrae.

meta.inherit_fields: goal:Kill all who would oppose the Umbrae.
